title: Quick Start for Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise and Red Hat CloudForms
subtitle: Adding Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise (with Metrics Enabled) as a Container Provider

abstract.para: This document provides a quick guide for integrating Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise container services (with metrics enabled) with Red Hat CloudForms. It is intended as an abridged reference for users already familiar with Red Hat CloudForms, Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
